question: Which among the following is an outcome of an Increased Repo rate to a consumer?
option3: Easy money borrowing in the market
explanation: Repo rate is the short term interest rate for the purchase of securities by the RBI. It is set by RBI in its Monetary policy. The increase in the repo rate means banks are going to get the funds at a high price and they are going to lend the money to customers at high price. So the interest rate for the loans will be high.
